And Black students. And trans students. And so on. But I have a lot of trouble believing the Trump Administration gives a fuck about any of them. This is just a politically expedient way for the Trumpies to attack institutions their political base hates.   It's scapegoating. And for a historian of antisemitism to express support for that, even with the qualifications she offers in the article, is sad.
